question_text: Which two of the following are true about Platform as a Service (PaaS)? (Select two)
answer_options: The provider manages the underlying hardware and OS
The customer is responsible for application deployment
The customer manages physical servers and cooling
The customer must install and configure the OS
correct_answer: The provider manages the underlying hardware and OS
The customer is responsible for application deployment
explanation: PaaS removes infrastructure responsibilities and gives customers a ready environment to deploy applications.
